GK19kmeghdpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMgD_1 //
GK19kmeghdpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:3: āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMgD_2 //
GK19kmeghdpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau
GK19kmeghdpu:5: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim /
GK19kmeghdpu:6: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:7: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMgD_5 //
GK19kmeghdpu:8: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:9: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā moghā varam
GK19kmeghdpu:11: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya
GK19kmeghdpu:12: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:13: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:14: garbhādhānakṣaṇaparicayān nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjāyām
GK19kmeghdpu:15: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilīndhrām avandhyāṃ tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:16: ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu /
GK19kmeghdpu:17: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānurūpaṃ saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam
GK19kmeghdpu:18: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya // KMgD_13 //
GK19kmeghdpu:19: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:20: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuḥkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya
GK19kmeghdpu:21: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveṣasya viṣṇoḥ tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārānabhijñaiḥ prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:22: sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhikṣetram āruhya mālaṃ kiṃ cit paścād vraja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:23: na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ // KMgD_17 //
GK19kmeghdpu:24: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe
GK19kmeghdpu:25: nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtaṃ toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:26: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya // KMgD_19 //
GK19kmeghdpu:27: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:28: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham
GK19kmeghdpu:29: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam // KMgD_21 //
GK19kmeghdpu:30: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
GK19kmeghdpu:31: śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:32: tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ gatvā sadyaḥ phalam api mahat kāmukatvasya labdhā
GK19kmeghdpu:33: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:34: yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni // viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann udyānānāṃ navajalakaṇair yūthikājālakāni /
GK19kmeghdpu:36: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:37: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMgD_27 //
GK19kmeghdpu:39: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMgD_28 //
GK19kmeghdpu:40: veṇībhūtapratanusalilā tām atītasya sindhuḥ pāṇḍucchāyā taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:41: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantī kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām
GK19kmeghdpu:42: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam // KMgD_30 //
GK19kmeghdpu:43: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:44: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūpair bandhuprītyā bhavanaśikhibhir dattanṛttopahāraḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:45: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya
GK19kmeghdpu:46: dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad atyeti bhānuḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:47: kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra līlāvadhūtai ratnacchāyāracitavalibhiś cāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:48: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn āmokṣyante tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān // KMgD_35 //
GK19kmeghdpu:49: paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:50: nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:51: saudāmanyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ // KMgD_37 //
GK19kmeghdpu:52: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:53: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu
GK19kmeghdpu:54: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam
GK19kmeghdpu:55: tasmād asyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam
GK19kmeghdpu:56: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi jñātāsvādo vivṛtajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ tvanniṣyandocchvasitavasudhāgandhasaṃparkaramyaḥ srotorandhradhvanitasubhagaṃ dantibhiḥ pīyamānaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:57: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām // tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā puṣpāsāraiḥ snapayatu bhavān vyomagaṅgājalādreḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:58: rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī putrapremṇā kuvalayadalaprāpi karṇe karoti
GK19kmeghdpu:59: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ ārādhyainaṃ śaravaṇabhavaṃ devam ullaṅghitādhvā siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:60: vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham /
GK19kmeghdpu:61: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ pakṣmotkṣepād uparivilasatkṛṣṇaśāraprabhāṇām
GK19kmeghdpu:63: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:64: rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ revatīlocanāṅkāṃ bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve /
GK19kmeghdpu:65: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ saumya sārasvatīnām antaḥśuddhas tvam asi bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ // KMgD_49 //
GK19kmeghdpu:66: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim
GK19kmeghdpu:67: gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni paścārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:68: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopagatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:69: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ śubhratrinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā bādhetolkākṣapitacamarībālabhāro davāgniḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:70: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ svāṅgabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam /
GK19kmeghdpu:71: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:72: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ kalpante 'sya
GK19kmeghdpu:74: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:75: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandareṣu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram
GK19kmeghdpu:76: tenodīcīṃ diśam anusares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ // gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ syāḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:77: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratidiśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate snigdhabhinnāñjanābhe sadyaḥkṛttadviradadaśanacchedagaurasya tasya
GK19kmeghdpu:78: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva // hitvā tasmin bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī
GK19kmeghdpu:79: bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalaughaḥ sopānatvaṃ kuru padasukhasparśam ārohaṇeṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ valayakuliśodghaṭṭanodgīrṇatoyaṃ neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo yantradhārāgṛhatvam
GK19kmeghdpu:80: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ // KMgD_61 //
GK19kmeghdpu:81: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghdpu:82: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśes taṃ nagendram // KMgD_62 //
GK19kmeghdpu:83: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādukūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin
GK19kmeghdpu:84: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam
GK19kmeghdpu:85: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMgD_64 //
GK19kmeghdpu:86: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā lodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:87: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām // yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:88: āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv āhateṣu yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujocchvāsitāliṅgitānām aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ tantujālāvalambāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:89: tvatsaṃrodhāpagamaviśadaiś cotitāś candrapādair vyālumpanti sphuṭajalalavasyandinaś candrakāntāḥ netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr ālekhyānāṃ salilakaṇikādoṣam utpādya sadyaḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:90: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇā jarjarā niṣpatanti // nīvībandhocchvasitaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu
GK19kmeghdpu:91: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇā cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ patracchedaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ karṇavibhraṃśibhiś ca /
GK19kmeghdpu:92: muktājālaiḥ stanaparicitacchinnasūtraiś ca hārair naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam /
GK19kmeghdpu:93: sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ // KMgD_71 //
GK19kmeghdpu:94: tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhād uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena /
GK19kmeghdpu:95: yasyodyāne kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastabakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ // vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:96: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ nādhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ // KMgD_73 //
GK19kmeghdpu:97: tasyās tīre racitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:98: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter mādhavīmaṇḍapasya
GK19kmeghdpu:99: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir mūle baddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:100: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ // KMgD_76 //
GK19kmeghdpu:101: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣayethā dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā /
GK19kmeghdpu:102: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ krīḍāśaile prathamakathite ramyasānau niṣaṇṇaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:103: arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharoṣṭhī madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇīprekṣaṇā nimnanābhiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:104: śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām
GK19kmeghdpu:105: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāṃ guruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharoṣṭham
GK19kmeghdpu:106: hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter bibharti āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī /
GK19kmeghdpu:107: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ sārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi rasike tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti // KMgD_82 //
GK19kmeghdpu:108: utsaṅge vā malinavasane saumya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā
GK19kmeghdpu:109: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī // KMgD_83 //
GK19kmeghdpu:110: śeṣān māsān virahadivasasthāpitasyāvadher vā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīmuktapuṣpaiḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:111: sambhogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ // savyāpārām ahani na tathā pīḍayed viprayogaḥ śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te /
GK19kmeghdpu:112: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃniṣaṇṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
GK19kmeghdpu:113: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā tām evoṣṇair virahamahatīm aśrubhir yāpayantīm niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam /
GK19kmeghdpu:114: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā tāṃ mayodveṣṭanīyām /
GK19kmeghdpu:115: sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamām ekaveṇīṃ kareṇa // pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva
GK19kmeghdpu:116: cakṣuḥ khedāt salilagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ sābhre 'hnīva
GK19kmeghdpu:117: sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām // KMgD_89 //
GK19kmeghdpu:118: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram
GK19kmeghdpu:119: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi
GK19kmeghdpu:120: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat // KMgD_91 //
GK19kmeghdpu:121: ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam
GK19kmeghdpu:122: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhāc calakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti vāmaś cāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā
GK19kmeghdpu:123: saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś calatvam tasmin kāle jalada yadi sā labdhanidrāsukhā syād anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva
GK19kmeghdpu:124: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gāḍhopagūḍham tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām
GK19kmeghdpu:125: vidyudgarbhe stimitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam
GK19kmeghdpu:126: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva /
GK19kmeghdpu:127: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ // KMgD_97 //
GK19kmeghdpu:128: tām āyuṣman mama ca vacanād ātmanaś copakartuṃ brūyā evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:129: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena
GK19kmeghdpu:130: uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpais tair viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt
GK19kmeghdpu:131: so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanābhyām adṛṣṭas tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha // KMgD_100 //
GK19kmeghdpu:132: śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān
GK19kmeghdpu:133: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te caṇḍi sādṛśyam asti // KMgD_101 //
GK19kmeghdpu:134: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum
GK19kmeghdpu:135: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālupyate me krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // KMgD_102 //
GK19kmeghdpu:136: mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor labdhāyās te katham api mayā svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu
GK19kmeghdpu:137: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv aśruleśāḥ patanti bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:138: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti saṃkṣipyeta kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt /
GK19kmeghdpu:139: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam
GK19kmeghdpu:140: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā /
GK19kmeghdpu:141: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu bhūyaś cāha tvam asi śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā
GK19kmeghdpu:142: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // KMgD_108 //
GK19kmeghdpu:143: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ
GK19kmeghdpu:144: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe hrāsinas te hy abhogād iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti kac cit saumya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyādeśān na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ kalpayāmi /
GK19kmeghdpu:145: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā
GK19kmeghdpu:146: iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ || iti kālidāsaviracitaṃ meghadūtaṃ samāptam ||
